review: I love it so far, positive things.. very easy to set up and navigate and I am not a very proficient computer/electronic geek. It automatically has all the songs you previously bought from amazon and plays them with the words like Karaoke.  I highly recommend the searching voice remote! Expensive but well worth it to me. SOMETHINGS TO BE AWARE OF is that even though the Fire TV spouts Netflix, Amazon Prime and a ton of other aspects they are very limited unless you buy a subscription, (although first 30 days are free) and even when you get a subscription to Amazon Prime many main stream shows you have to pay money for, and if they are current shows you can only get many of them a few weeks after they air on regular TV & some you are limited to a few seasons so you cant always start from the beginning. You should get this and look at it as a menu to access all the TV shows that you can get on your computer free, like on regular Hulu. unless you go the extra $100.00+ that gets you Amazon Prime, Netflix  etc...yearly subscription.
